DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose randomize controlled trial evaluate whether addition financial incentive high-quality , online behavioral weight loss intervention produce good weight loss online treatment alone .
DOC.brief_title: Internet Assisted Obesity Treatment Enhanced With Financial Incentives
DOC.detailed_description: Overweight obese otherwise healthy participant ( N=416 ) recruit approximately equal number two clinical center , University South Carolina University Vermont . Eligible participant randomize one two condition : 1 ) 18-month , 36-session group Internet behavioral weight control treatment ( Internet Only ) replicate intervention investigator implement previously ; 2 ) 18-month , 36-session group Internet treatment plus financial incentive performance 3 key self-management behavior ( Internet+ Incentive ) . Both condition access web-based intervention platform counselor-delivered intervention element ; presence economic incentive behavioral weight goal difference condition . Assessments conduct Baseline , 2 , 6 , 12 18 month . Cost data collect inform cost effectiveness evaluation .
DOC.criteria: 18 BMI 25 50 Not currently pregnant pregnant previous 6 month currently breastfeed plan become pregnant 18 month Have computer home work flashplayer , access internet , smart phone ( allow use step count aps ) Free medical problem might contraindicate participation behavioral weight reduction program containing exercise component Not enrol another weight reduction program Not currently medication would affect weight loss heart attack stroke previous six month weight loss surgery lose 10 pound previous 6 month currently take medication weight loss require doctor follow special diet ( low fat ) planning move area within 18 month schedule conflict make difficult attend online `` chat '' live 60 minute drive distance either University South Carolina University Vermont campus
